text: We are the foundation of flight shopping.

And part of our emit today is
to reimagine how we're doing that
so that we can do it in the cloud.

What we're trying to do

At the end of the day,

that's possible now that wasn't possible

one would be,

you have to get

This makes testing and proof of concepts

ATPCO today
is now entering a phase of development

in which we're very clear on
what the outcomes are going to be.

What AWS provides for us is an abstraction

It really means that they can spend
